name: Thumb/Wrist Brace
descr:
Designed as a preventive for carpal tunnel syndrome. Provides firm comfortable support and helps prevent wrist injury. Keeps wrist in natural (straight)Â position to counter excessive repetitive motions leading to carpal tunnel syndrome. Wrap around design allows full mobility of fingers and thumb.
